title: The Fractured Memory

knows: Someone locked/unlocked her oldest backup to control timing of discovery - likely Kauffman
Investigation may be orchestrated, not rebellious
Her behavior follows predictable patterns - could be programming
Original Aria killed stopping vault breach 5 years ago
Original Aria died with consciousness dissolution - no resurrection
She was built from 6-month-old backup (missing final memories)
Marcus suggests Dr. Tanaka was the breach Original Aria stopped
Personality traits survive consciousness transfer (Marcus theory)
The Archivist gave her Original Aria's final 6 months of restricted files
The Archivist chose to intervene/help by sharing forbidden data

revealed_to_reader: Investigation may be controlled by Kauffman
Behavior patterns could be programming or professionalism
Original Aria killed with full consciousness dissolution
Built from outdated backup missing final critical memories
Dr. Tanaka possibly involved in breach that killed Original Aria
The Archivist decided to help by sharing restricted files
Original Aria's final memories available to Aria now

planted.significance: Critical discovery that got her killed

planted.element: Tanaka as possible vault breach perpetrator

chapter_function.plot: Orchestrated investigation revealed, Original Aria's death context, Archivist gives forbidden data
chapter_function.character: Aria discovering even investigation may be controlled, Archivist choosing sides
